errors.error_description: Pins to a specific old version 0.15.0 instead of allowing latest version installation
correction_candidates: Remove version pin to use 'pip install iris-grib' for latest version
Use 'pip install iris-grib>=0.15.0' to allow newer versions
Change to 'pip install iris-grib~=0.15.0' for compatible patch versions
Update to 'pip install "iris-grib>=0.15.0,<1.0.0"' for safe version range
errors.golden_answer: Remove version pin to use 'pip install iris-grib' for latest version
